title: System Thinking Application in Higher Education Research: Integration of People, Processes, and Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary research methodologies and experience in primary education settings
context.additional_context: A course designed for practicing elementary educators to systematically experience systems thinking approaches in simulation and VR environments.

learning_goals: Analyze complex problems in educational settings using a systems thinking framework
Visualize interactions between people-process-technology with simulation/VR tools and propose improvement strategies
Design sustainable educational solutions through stakeholder collaboration and iterative research processes
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
